mapper.select: select count(ORDER_STATUS) orderCount,ORDER_STATUS orderStatus,COM_KEY comKey from YDZ_SALESCHECKING_ORDER where IS_VALID = '1' AND IS_DEL = '0' and ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} and COM_KEY = #{comKey}
select GROUP_CONCAT(SALES_NO) salesNos from ydz_saleschecking_order_detail where IS_VALID = '1' AND IS_DEL = '0' AND SALESCHECKING_NO IN ${salescheckingNoIns}
mapper.delete: delete from YDZ_SALESCHECKING_ORDER where COM_KEY = #{comKey} and SALESCHECKING_NO = #{salescheckingNo}

update YDZ_SALESCHECKING_ORDER
SALESCHECKING_NO = #{salescheckingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_KEY = #{comKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_KEY = #{partnerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_SHORTNAME = #{partnerShortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_ID = #{salesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_NAME = #{salesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_ID = #{contactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SELF_NO = #{orderSelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CYCLE = #{orderCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_DESC = #{caseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISCOUNT_RATE = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAX_PRICE = #{taxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREFERENTIAL = #{preferential,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT_REQUESTED = #{depositRequested,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECEIVABLES_MONEY = #{receivablesMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVOICE_MONEY = #{invoiceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAID_UP = #{paidUp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BALANCE_MONEY = #{balanceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
INVOICE_STATUS = #{invoiceStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=CHAR},
SALES_ORDER_NUM = #{salesOrderNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DETAIL_NUM = #{detailNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHANGED_TIME = #{changedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_ID = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_NO = #{salesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASECHECKING_NO = #{purchasecheckingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where COM_KEY = #{comKey} and SALESCHECKING_NO = #{salescheckingNo}

update YDZ_SALESCHECKING_ORDER set SALESCHECKING_NO = #{salescheckingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_KEY = #{comKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_KEY = #{partnerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_SHORTNAME = #{partnerShortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_ID = #{salesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_NAME = #{salesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_ID = #{contactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_SELF_NO = #{orderSelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CYCLE = #{orderCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_DESC = #{caseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISCOUNT_RATE = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TAX_PRICE = #{taxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREFERENTIAL = #{preferential,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT_REQUESTED = #{depositRequested,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECEIVABLES_MONEY = #{receivablesMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVOICE_MONEY = #{invoiceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAID_UP = #{paidUp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BALANCE_MONEY = #{balanceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, INVOICE_STATUS = #{invoiceStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=CHAR}, SALES_ORDER_NUM = #{salesOrderNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DETAIL_NUM = #{detailNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHANGED_TIME = #{changedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_ID = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_NO = #{salesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASECHECKING_NO = #{purchasecheckingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where COM_KEY = #{comKey} and SALESCHECKING_NO = #{salescheckingNo}

UPDATE YDZ_SALESCHECKING_ORDER
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
INVOICE_STATUS = #{invoiceStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHANGED_TIME = #{changedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAID_UP = #{paidUp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BALANCE_MONEY = #{balanceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_SETTLEMENT = #{isSettlement,jdbcType=CHAR},
where SALESCHECKING_NO IN
#{item}

update YDZ_SALESCHECKING_ORDER
PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_SHORTNAME = #{partnerShortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where COM_KEY = #{comKey} and PARTNER_KEY = #{partnerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
